p: It must be considered that the film barrier behavior at 8 Â°C is the most crucial for food packaging applications, as it corresponds to home and commercial (supermarket) storage conditions. At this temperature the gas transmission rate of O 2 and CO 2 is very similar: CO 2 permeates maximum 1.4 times faster than O 2, as it can be seen from the perm-selectivity ratio reported in Table 2.
